video_prompt: Flowing blue-green hair sways around a young woman's face. Her wide eyes blink, and her glossy lips subtly shift. Speckles shimmer and dance across her hair and an abstract neckpiece, which subtly phases colors.
image_prompt: Expressive watercolor painting of a young woman, front-facing bust shot. Vibrant blue and green palette. Wild, flowing dark blue and emerald green hair with light green streaks and white speckles. Fair skin with rosy cheeks, wide piercing blue eyes with long lashes and soft dark brows, small nose, full glossy red-orange lips. Neck and chest are an artistic splash of blue and green with white speckles. Plain light beige background. Anime/manga style with painterly watercolor finish.
refined_video_prompt: Her hair gracefully sways around her face. Her eyes blink, and lips subtly shift. Speckles shimmer and dance across her hair, and a neckpiece fluidly phases through colors.
